nodes.text: Grunda Painting was a painting made sometime after the Battle of Yavin. It was a painting made by the Gungan painter Odoof Grunda, depicting the late Sidoras Bey sculpting a statue of Emperor Palpatine.

The Grunda Painting is awarded to players after completing a quest. As the quest is repeatable, the player can also acquire multiple copies of the painting. Although the description implies that the painting depicted that of Sidoras Bey, the in-game appearance was the same as Ronka Plant.
